sql.if: and( fjsq.yy like '%'||#{entire}||'%' or sjxx.ybbh like '%'||#{entire}||'%' or sjxx.hzxm like '%'||#{entire}||'%' or yblxmc like '%'||#{entire}||'%' or sjxx.db like '%'||#{entire}||'%' or jcxm.csmc like '%'||#{entire}||'%' or sjxx.nbbm like '%'||#{entire}||'%' or fjsq.bz like '%'||#{entire}||'%')

mapper.select:
select fjsq.fjid,fjsq.zt,fjsq.yy,fjsq.bz,fjsq.sjid,fjsq.lx,fjsq.jcxm,fjsq.bgbj,fjsq.lrsj,sjxx.nbbm,sjxx.ybbh,sjxx.hzxm ,case when sjxx.yblxmc is null then yblx.csmc else sjxx.yblxmc end yblxmc,fjlx.csmc as lxmc, fjlx.csdm as fjlxdm,sjxx.sfsc as sfsc,fjsq.sfff,fjsq.jcdw,jc_jcdw.csmc as jcdwmc ,case when fjsq.bz is null then fjsq.yy else fjsq.bz end f_bz, fjsq.rjcbj jcbj, fjsq.djcbj, fjsq.qtjcbj, fjsq.rsyrq syrq, fjsq.dsyrq, fjsq.qtsyrq from igams_fjsq fjsq left join igams_sjxx sjxx on sjxx.sjid =fjsq.sjid left join matridx_jcsj yblx on yblx.csid=sjxx.yblx left join matridx_jcsj fjlx on fjlx.csid=fjsq.lx left join matridx_jcsj jc_jcdw on fjsq.jcdw=jc_jcdw.csid
fjsq.scbj!='1' and fjsq.fjid=#{fjid}

select fjsq.fjid,fjsq.zt,fjsq.yy,fjsq.bz,fjsq.sjid,fjsq.lx,fjsq.jcxm,fjsq.bgbj,fjsq.lrsj,sjxx.nbbm,sjxx.ybbh,sjxx.hzxm ,case when sjxx.yblxmc is null then yblx.csmc else sjxx.yblxmc end yblxmc,fjlx.csmc as lxmc, fjlx.csdm as fjlxdm,sjxx.sfsc as sfsc,fjsq.sfff,fjsq.jcdw,jc_jcdw.csmc as jcdwmc ,case when fjsq.bz is null then fjsq.yy else fjsq.bz end f_bz, fjsq.rjcbj jcbj, fjsq.djcbj, fjsq.qtjcbj, fjsq.rsyrq syrq, fjsq.dsyrq, fjsq.qtsyrq from igams_fjsq fjsq left join igams_sjxx sjxx on sjxx.sjid =fjsq.sjid left join matridx_jcsj yblx on yblx.csid=sjxx.yblx left join matridx_jcsj fjlx on fjlx.csid=fjsq.lx left join matridx_jcsj jc_jcdw on fjsq.jcdw=jc_jcdw.csid LEFT JOIN matridx_jsjcdw jsjcdw ON jsjcdw.jcdw = sjxx.jcdw
fjsq.scbj!='1' and sjxx.ybbh=#{ybbh} AND jsjcdw.jsid=#{jsid}

select fjsq.fjid,fjsq.lrsj,fjsq.shlx ,sjxx.ybbh,sjxx.db,sjxx.hzxm,sjxx.nl,case when sjxx.yblxmc is null then yblx.csmc else sjxx.yblxmc end yblxmc,sjxx.nbbm,sjxx.sfsc as sfsc from igams_fjsq fjsq left join matridx_jcsj jcxm on jcxm.csid = fjsq.jcxm left join igams_sjxx sjxx on sjxx.sjid=fjsq.sjid left join matridx_jcsj yblx on yblx.csid=sjxx.yblx
fjsq.scbj !='1'
and( sjxx.ybbh like '%'||#{entire}||'%' or sjxx.hzxm like '%'||#{entire}||'%' or sjxx.db like '%'||#{entire}||'%' or jcxm.csmc like '%'||#{entire}||'%' or sjxx.nbbm like '%'||#{entire}||'%')
and fjsq.yy like '%'||#{yy}||'%'
and fjsq.zt like '%'||#{zt}||'%'
and fjsq.bz like '%'||#{bz}||'%'
and jcxm.csmc like '%'||#{jcxm}||'%'
and fjsq.jcdw in
#{item}

select fjsq.fjid,fjsq.zt,fjsq.yy,fjsq.lx,fjsq.jcxm,fjsq.bz,fjsq.sjid,fjsq.lrry, case when fjsq.bgbj ='0' then '不发送' when fjsq.bgbj='1' then '发送' end bgbjmc, shxx_sqsj,shxx_gwmc,sqr,shxx_lrryxm,shxx_shsj,shxx_sftg,shxx_shxxid,sjxx.jsrq ,sjxx.ybbh,sjxx.db,sjxx.hzxm,sjxx.nl,case when sjxx.yblxmc is null then yblx.csmc else sjxx.yblxmc end yblxmc,sjxx.nbbm,sjxx.sfsc as sfsc ,fjlx.csmc as lxmc,jc_jcdw.csmc as jcdwmc from igams_fjsq fjsq left join igams_sjxx sjxx on sjxx.sjid=fjsq.sjid left join matridx_jcsj yblx on yblx.csid=sjxx.yblx left join matridx_jcsj fjlx ON fjlx.csid= fjsq.lx left join matridx_jcsj jc_jcdw on fjsq.jcdw=jc_jcdw.csid join
select #{item.fjid} fjid,#{item.shxx_shxxid} shxx_shxxid,#{item.shxx_sqsj} shxx_sqsj,#{item.sqr} sqr,#{item.shxx_lrryxm} shxx_lrryxm,#{item.shxx_shsj} shxx_shsj,#{item.shxx_sftg} shxx_sftg,#{item.shxx_gwmc} shxx_gwmc,#{index} rownum
tmp on tmp.fjid = fjsq.fjid order by tmp.rownum

select yh.yhid,yh.ddid,gwcy.jsid from matridx_xtyh yh left join matridx_spgwcy gwcy on gwcy.yhid = yh.yhid left join matridx_yhjs yhjs on yhjs.yhid = yh.yhid and gwcy.jsid =yhjs.jsid left join matridx_jsjcdw jcdw on jcdw.jsid= yhjs.jsid left join matridx_xtjs js on js.jsid = yhjs.jsid
yh.scbj != '1' and yh.sfsd!='1' and js.scbj ='0' and (jcdw.jcdw = #{jcdw} or js.dwxdbj = '0')
and yh.ddid in
#{item}
group by yh.yhid,yh.ddid,gwcy.jsid

sql.if: left join matridx_jcsj jc_yblx on jc_yblx.csid=sjxx.yblx
left join matridx_jcsj jc_jcxm on jc_jcxm.csid=fjsq.jcxm
left join matridx_xtyh xtyh on xtyh.yhid=fjsq.lrry
left join matridx_jcsj fjlx on fjlx.csid=fjsq.lx

mapper.select:
select count(fjsq.fjid) from igams_fjsq fjsq left join matridx_jcsj jcxm on jcxm.csid =fjsq.jcxm left join igams_sjxx sjxx on sjxx.sjid= fjsq.sjid left join igams_sjhbxx sjhb on sjhb.hbmc =sjxx.db and sjhb.scbj = '0'
fjsq.scbj!='1'

select fjsq.fjid,fjsq.scbj ${sqlparam} from (
select #{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR} fjid,#{index} ordernum
) tmp left outer join igams_fjsq fjsq on tmp.fjid = fjsq.fjid left outer join igams_sjxx sjxx on sjxx.sjid=fjsq.sjid
order by tmp.ordernum

select jc.cskz1 as jcxmcskz from igams_fjsq fj left join matridx_jcsj jc on jc.csid=fj.jcxm
fj.scbj!='1' and fj.fjid in
#{item}
group by jcxmcskz
select fjsq.sjid from igams_fjsq fjsq where fjid = #{fjid}
